title: Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 41 (Hypersexu
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 41 (Hypersexual Society 2):

We visit this topic again. It covers a range of related issues: pornography, prostitution, sexual revolution, .. It even includes several titles about sex in the Bible. The following  book is important and deserves a special mention; it is a must-read:

-  Ethridge & Arterburn - Every Young Woman's Battle; Guarding Your Mind, Heart, and Body in a Sex-Saturated World (2004)

In total, we have 36 titles:

-  Agustin - Sex at the Margins; Migration, Labour Markets and the Rescue Industry (2007)

-  Blanshard - Sex, Vice, and Love from Antiquity to Modernity (2010)

-  Bruckert - Taking It Off, Putting It On; Women in the Strip Trade (2002)

-  Dabhoiwala - The Origins of Sex; a History of the First Sexual Revolution (2012)

-  Dapin - Sex & Money; How I Lived, Breathed, Read, Wrote, Loved, Hated, Dreamed and Drank Men's Magazines (2004)

-  Di Nicola et al (Eds.) - Prostitution and Human Trafficking; Focus on Clients (2009)

-  Dines - Pornland; How Porn Has Hijacked Our Sexuality (2010)

-  Ditmore - Prostitution and Sex Work; Historical Guides to Controversial Issues in America (2011)

-  Egan - Dancing for Dollars and Paying for Love; the Relationships Between Exotic Dancers and Their Regulars (2006)

-  Ethridge & Arterburn - Every Young Woman's Battle; Guarding Your Mind, Heart, and Body in a Sex-Saturated World (2004)

-  Gonzalez & Yanes - Tango; Sex and Rhythm of the City (2013)

-  Hazleton - Jezebel; the Untold Story of the Bible's Harlot Queen (2007)

-  Hines & Kerr (Eds.) - Hard to Swallow; Hard-core Pornography on Screen (2012)

-  Hofler - Sexplosion (2014)

-  Ipsen - Sex Working and the Bible (2009)

-  Kahr - Who's Been Sleeping in Your Head; the Secret World of Sexual Fantasies (2008)

-  Krzywinska - Sex and the Cinema (2006)

-  LeMoncheck - Loose Women, Lecherous Men; a Feminist Philosophy of Sex (1997)

-  Lim - Invisible Trade; High-Class Sex for Sale in Singapore (2004)

-  Lim - Invisible Trade II; Secret Lives and Sexual Intrigue in Singapore (2008)

-  Malarek - The Johns; Sex for Sale and the Men Who Buy It (2011)

-  Mancini - Magnus Hirschfeld and the Quest for Sexual Freedom (2010)

-  Matich - Erotic Utopia; the Decadent Imagination in Russia's Fin De Siecle (2005)

-  Mohler - Desire and Deceit; the Real Cost of the New Sexual Tolerance (2008)

-  Nagle (Ed.) - Whores and Other Feminists (1997)

-  Pennington - The History of Sex in American Film (2007)

-  Peterson & Hefner - The Century of Sex; Playboy's History of the Sexual Revolution, 1900-1999 (1999)

-  Ruttenberg (Ed.) - The Passionate Torah; Sex and Judaism (2009)

-  Sanders - Prostitution, Sex Work, Policy and Politics (2009)

-  Snitow et al (Eds.) - Powers of Desire; the Politics of Sexuality (1983)

-  Tanaka - Japan's Comfort Women; Sexual Slavery and Prostitution During World War II and the US Occupation (2002)

-  Technical, Business, and Legal Dimensions of Protecting Children from Pornography on The Internet (2002)

-  Teitelbaum - Athletes Who Indulge their Dark Side; Sex, Drugs, and Cover-ups (2010)

-  Tyler - Selling Sex Short; the Pornographic and Sexological Construction of Women's Sexuality in the West (2011)

-  Vickers - Chasing Lolita; How Popular Culture Corrupted Nabokov's Little Girl All Over Again (2008)

-  Zelizer -The Purchase of Intimacy (2005)
